mean_en: a sports competition involving a number of teams or players who take part in different games and must leave the competition if they lose. The competition continues until there is only the winner left.
sentence: A tournament is a sports competition which continues until only the winner is left.
sentence_trans: 锦标赛是一种体育竞赛，其赛事会一直持续到只剩下冠军为止。
